October 2011  – Present (3 years 11 months) Sunnyvale, CA I currently manage three teams, 20 professionals, focused on display advertising at Yahoo!; Homepage & Login Page Campaign Management, Rich Media Sales Engineering and Smart Ads Operations. I lead a strong team that provides technical expertise for rich media and data-driven dynamic creative. My role includes working extensively with leadership teams to develop and execute a cohesive online advertising strategy, generate revenue growth, and ensure operational excellence. Part of my responsibility is to ensure that the team of leaders from product management, sales, operations, marketing, and engineering are aligned and working toward the same vision. I am continuously working to identify inefficiencies and make recommendations for process improvements. Sr. Manager, Global Homepage Advertising Yahoo! April 2010  –  September 2011  (1 year 6 months) Sunnyvale, CA ● Drove execution of advertising on the US Homepage and Login Page to meet the needs and expectations of top-tier clients, leading a team of 5 Campaign Managers  
● Led the team do develop, design and launch the new Login Page ad product; enforce creative specs and policies, provide exceptional customer service and flawless campaign execution  
● Focus on innovation and new product development for the Homepage and Login Page.  
● Provide feedback to develop tools to better support the needs of the Campaign Management team to allow for efficiencies. Manager, Front Page Advertising Yahoo! Inc. February 2007  –  April 2010  (3 years 3 months) Sunnyvale, CA ● Managed a team of 4 campaign managers that execute all Front Page ad products.  
● Oversaw Front Page advertising strategy and execution processes.  
● Managed evolving and changing ad products and client communication and expectations through a Front Page redesign. Campaign Manager, Front Page Advertising Yahoo! Inc. May 2004  –  January 2007  (2 years 9 months) Sunnyvale, CA ● Manage relationships with media agencies, creative agencies, Fortune 1000 advertisers and cross-functional internal team members.  
● Work with Front Page creative and engineering teams to flawlessly execute successful Front Page advertising programs.  
● Initiate kick off calls with sales, advertisers and creative/media agencies; set up and manage project timelines and creative direction with agency/client; manage all communications and approvals between the client/agency and internal team throughout the creative build/review process.  
● Troubleshoot technical and scheduling issues; QA campaigns prior to launch and ensure executions go live on time; develop a summary of each campaign's performance for clients; supporting the development and maintenance of Front Page sales tools; continually drive innovation of the Front Page advertising products.  
● Detail-oriented, customer service focused, highly-organized, able to calmly perform under a high stress/deadline-driven environment. Sales Planner, NW Sales Yahoo! Inc. March 2001  –  May 2004  (3 years 3 months) Sunnyvale, CA • Collaborated with internal sales and external clients on proposal development, retention, and growth of high-level accounts such as Charles Schwab, Intel, Oracle, Visa and Wells Fargo. 
• Daily client communications to identify campaign objectives, negotiate pricing, determine ad placements, and monitor campaign performance and delivery. 
• Managed program launches and coordinated all aspects of the clients marketing programs including billing, creative, terms and conditions, and revenue recognition. Summary A digital marketing enthusiast, with over 7 years of experience in digital strategy, account management & business analytics. Adept in analyzing trends to provide critical, actionable insights and inputs for formulating business strategies.  
A results-oriented, enterprising individual with good problem solving skills, and leadership abilities. I have worked with various cross-functional, also geographically & culturally diverse teams and thrive on meeting collective team-goals.  
In my current role, I lead a team of highly skilled strategists, and am responsible for growth of performance display ad revenues at Yahoo India. 
 
Areas of expertise: Marketplace Management, RTB, Programmatic media buying, Business Strategy & Operations, Media Planning and Account Management 
 
Recent career highlight: Awarded Operational Excellence Award, APAC Ad Solutions (H1 2014).
